description: Defines the settings for Front Matter custom script
title: Front Matter - custom script

title.description: Title you want to give to your script. Will be shown as the title of the button.

script.description: Path to the script to execute

nodeBin.description: Path to the node executable. This is required when using NVM, so that there is no confusion of which node version to use. (deprecated: use the command property instead)

bulk.description: Run the script for all content files

output.description: Define where you want to output your script output. Default is a notification, but you can specify to show it in an editor panel.

outputType.description: The type of output for the editor panel. Can be used to change it to 'markdown' for example

type.description: The type for which the script will be used.

command.description: The type of script you want to execute.

hidden.description: Hide the action from the UI

type.description: The environment type for which the script needs to be used

script.description: Path to the script to execute

contentTypes.description: Define the content types for which the script will be used. If none are defined, it will be available to all types.
